channel.title: Nara on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Nara on EICP-LAB

item.title: International Energy Workshop
item.description: PhD candidate Yang ZHANG was invited to present his co-authored research with Professor Yangsiyu LU, titled “Global Potential of Mine Photovoltaic Systems for Sustainable Energy Transition”, at the the 43rd edition of the International Energy Workshop (IEW), held in Nara, Japan, from June 10 to 13.
